channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A third-generation NYC candy shop owner says Trump’s historic tariffs will devastate his business—and fears ‘hyperinflation’
item.description: Economy Candy was already feeling the weight of surges in prices of cocoa and other ingredients before tariffs were layered on.

item.title: Exclusive: US Chamber of Commerce is considering suing the Trump administration to halt global tariff assault
item.description: Many big-company CEOs have been resistant to speaking out against the tariffs; No one wants a target on their back. Enter trade groups like the Chambe...

item.title: Bitcoin struggles to be ‘digital gold’ as scared investors choose real gold instead
item.description: The composite price of gold is up 16% since January 1 while Bitcoin is down almost 14%.

item.title: Ex-official says he was forced out of FDA after trying to protect vaccine safety data from RFK Jr.
item.description: The nation’s former top vaccine regulator says he feared that the information might be manipulated or even deleted.

item.title: Saylor’s Strategy to register $5.9 billion loss after accounting change
item.description: Shares of the company formerly knowns as MicroStrategy fell as much as 14% on Monday.

item.title: Stocks stage dramatic turnaround after racing lower at opening bell
America first, fine; America alone, dangerous: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon
Wall Street’s ‘fear gauge’ soars to a ‘crisis’ level. That’s very unusual.
Apple's stock could see its worst three-day slide since the dot-com bust
Apple is third of ‘Magnificent 7’ to encounter ‘death cross.’ It won’t be last.
